original: PETERSSON, Georg, Grosshandlare, Malmö, f Brandstad 25/11 67. Eft slut skolgång anst hdlsbransch, repres fma Johan Samuelsson Kristianstad o Adolf Lindahl Malmö, disp dta AB. Deläg fma Petersson & Ekelund, manuf o kläder i parti, sed. 07.
translated: PETERSSON, Georg, Wholesale merchant, Malmö, born in Brandstad on November 25, 1867. After completing school, he started working in the commerce industry, representing the firms Johan Samuelsson in Kristianstad and Adolf Lindahl in Malmö. Eventually became a manager at AB (Company Name). He was a co-owner of the company Petersson & Ekelund, specializing in wholesale clothing, since 1907.

structured.name: Georg Pettersson
structured.description: Georg Pettersson was a wholesale merchant from Malmö, Sweden. He was born on November 25, 1867, in Brandstad. After completing school, he began working in the commerce industry and represented Johan Samuelsson in Kristianstad and Adolf Lindahl in Malmö. Later, he became a manager at AB (Company Name). Additionally, he was a co-owner of Petersson & Ekelund, a company specializing in wholesale clothing, since 1907.
